title: 차량 자율주행 글로벌 슈퍼 스타트업 Algorithm engineer
content:
주요 업무
                    1. Software Development (80%) - Autonomous driving simulation (A simulator that runs on a purpose-built simulation engine to provide a dedicated virtualization environment for automated driving de…
            더 보기
            1. Software Development (80%) - Autonomous driving simulation (A simulator that runs on a purpose-built simulation engine to provide a dedicated virtualization environment for automated driving development) - training set augmentation and simulation (e.g. generative adversarial network)2. Algorithm optimization & implementation support for H/W (e.g. TI TDA series, Renesas R-Car series) (20%)

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          ADAS 알고리즘 개발
          자율주행차
          embedded
          C C++
          영상처리 소프트웨어 알고리즘
          algorithm

채용 상세
                    자격요건- Excellent C/C++programming skills.- (Preferred) experience at automotive Tier-1, OEM- (Preferred) experience on embedded hardware
